thread.title: Holly Willoughby gets painfully flustered by NAKED Marti Pellow on This Morning
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby gets painfully flustered by NAKED Marti Pellow on This Morning

title: Holly Willoughby gets painfully flustered by NAKED Marti Pellow on This Morning
text:
Holly Willoughby gets painfully flustered by NAKED Marti Pellow on This Morning Holly Willoughby gets painfully flustered by NAKED Marti Pellow on This Morning HOLLY WILLOUGHBY was left incredibly red-faced during today’s This Morning after flirting up a storm with Marti Pellow. PUBLISHED: 14:28, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:38, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 
The former Wet, Wet, Wet singer appeared on the ITV show to promote his new album Mysterious, but attention soon turned to the bizarre ritual he always abided to while recording some of his biggest hits. 
“This is how we’ve been plugging you all morning,” teased Phillip Schofield . “Do you or do you not record naked?” 
As the excitable mother-of-three grilled the 51-year-old about his unconventional habit, Marti turned coy. 
“I would dare say that sometimes the studio is a hot place,” he grinned. Related articles
